page.title: 16RECENT EVENTS IN STRACHAN
page.content: The Press & Journal gave notice that a road survey had been made and that there would be a{speed limit}of 40 miles per hour through the village. A{wedding took place in the church}in June. We went out to see the people as they came out of church.The bride groom and best man wore kilts. The bride wore a long white dress and the bridesmaid also wore a long dress. The{school sports}were held on Sat. 15 June.A marquee tent was set up for selling of beer,wine and other refreshments.Also there were other money raising stalls like barbecue, helium baloons,welly throwing and tombola.There was a knock out comp. with nearby schools. Over Â£340 was raised for the school. There was a like event for the hall in July.An added attraction was{ferret racing and {flying model aeroplanes.
